duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform tasks related to LEED, Enterprise Green Communities, and National Green Building Standard certification, including technical design reviews, scorecard development, and facilitating meetings.
Consult and manage the certification of projects, coordinating with design professionals and contractors through the design and construction phases.
Create supporting documentation, register projects, and track billing for consulting services.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree and/or graduate degree in a related field preferred
